import React from 'react'
import { GlobalCtx } from '../interfaces'

const GlobalContext = React.createContext<GlobalCtx>({
    stories: [],
    defaultInterval: 4000,
    width: 360,
    height: 640
})

export default GlobalContext

import React from 'react'
import { ProgressContext } from './../interfaces'

export default React.createContext<ProgressContext>({
    numArray: [],
    currentId: 0,
    count: 0,
    currentStory: { url: '' },
    videoDuration: 0,
    bufferAction: false,
    pause: false
})

import React from 'react' import { SeeMoreProps } from './../interfaces' // import up from './../up.png' export default function seeMore(props: SeeMoreProps) { const SeeMoreContent = props.seeMoreContent return ( props.showContent ?
props.toggleMore(false)} />
